snippet: Past business, financial or tax moves that made sense to potential officeholders at the time can come back to haunt them, even if the moves are legal.
abstract: Paul Sullivan Wealth Matters column observes that past business, financial or tax moves that made sense to potential officeholders at the time can come back to haunt them, even if the moves are legal.
lead_paragraph: Past business, financial or tax moves that made sense to potential officeholders at the time can come back to haunt them, even if the moves are legal.

headline.print_headline: Aspire to Public Office? Mind Your Financial Decisions Now
headline.seo: Making Financial Decisions With a View to Future Public Office
headline.main: Aspire to Public Office? Mind Your Financial Decisions Now
